title: Ride FARR Bolt-On Extender Range with 60 mm and 120 mm
content:
Ride FARR just announced its first new product in some time; 60 mm and 120 mm Bolt-On Extenders for various cockpit configuations. Let’s check them out in detail below…

It’s been just over five years since FARR first introduced the Carbon Aero Bolt-On. What started out as an idea to add an additional hand position and comfort to 31.8 mm Handlebars has evolved significantly since then.

During the five year period the brand also added products to the complete handlebar category, offering handlebars ( the Aero Gravel, Aero Drop & Aero MTB ) for both styles of riding – those being dropbar riders and mountain bikers.

While the original concept was all about keeping things compact and lightweight, the demands and growth of Gravel/Adventure/Bikepacking events has certainly evolved too.

FARR has developed here is a new evolution of the original Bolt-On concept…

Available in two versions, catering for a mixed variety of riders and bike setups. The options are almost unlimited in terms of usage and combinations with our other existing products.

Extender Large 120mm

This is the longer version and can be used individually or combined with Aero Gravel / Aero Drop / Aero MTB. These are also compatible with both versions of our Armrest Kit.

Lightweight 6061-T6 Alloy
31.8mm Clamps ( converts to 22.2 with Shim-Set )
Compatible with multiple FARR handlebar models
Compatible with Non-FARR 31.8 handlebar models
Weight : 174g ( Pair )

Extender Medium 60mm

This is the shorter version but even more versatile in application. Run this as an inner bar-end or combined with Aero Gravel / Aero Drop / Aero MTB.

  • Lightweight 6061-T6 Alloy
  • 31.8mm Clamps ( converts to 22.2 with Shim-Set )
  • Compatible with multiple FARR handlebar models
  • Compatible with Non-FARR 31.8 handlebar models
  • Weight : 140g ( Pair )
